constraints.name: capacity_constraint
constraints.description: 每个节点容纳的球数不超过其容量

constraints.name: flow_constraint
constraints.description: 球只能从父节点流向未充满的子节点，且流向由电荷代数和决定

constraints.name: state_transition
constraints.description: 球下落过程中，节点状态（容纳的球数）会根据规则更新

constraints.name: decision_rule
constraints.description: 当左右子树电荷代数和相等时，球的下落方向由神明决定
